Name: ResearchDefinition
Description: A research context or question+ Warning: Name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generationElements defined in Ancestors: id, meta, implicitRules, language, text, contained, extension, modifierExtension

Name: url
Description: Canonical identifier for this research definition, represented as a URI (globally unique)

Name: identifier
Description: Additional identifier for the research definition

Name: version
Description: Business version of the research definition

Name: name
Description: Name for this research definition (computer friendly)

Name: title
Description: Name for this research definition (human friendly)

Name: shortTitle
Description: Title for use in informal contexts

Name: subtitle
Description: Subordinate title of the ResearchDefinition

Name: status
Description: draft | active | retired | unknownPublicationStatus (Required)

Name: experimental
Description: For testing purposes, not real usage

Name: subjectCodeableconcept
Description: E.g. Patient, Practitioner, RelatedPerson, Organization, Location, DeviceSubject type (Extensible)

Name: subjectReference(group)
Description: E.g. Patient, Practitioner, RelatedPerson, Organization, Location, DeviceSubject type (Extensible)

Name: date
Description: Date last changed

Name: publisher
Description: Name of the publisher (organization or individual)

Name: contact
Description: Contact details for the publisher

Name: description
Description: Natural language description of the research definition

Name: comment
Description: Used for footnotes or explanatory notes

Name: useContext
Description: The context that the content is intended to support

Name: jurisdiction
Description: Intended jurisdiction for research definition (if applicable)Jurisdiction (Extensible)

Name: purpose
Description: Why this research definition is defined

Name: usage
Description: Describes the clinical usage of the ResearchDefinition

Name: copyright
Description: Use and/or publishing restrictions

Name: approvalDate
Description: When the research definition was approved by publisher

Name: lastReviewDate
Description: When the research definition was last reviewed

Name: effectivePeriod
Description: When the research definition is expected to be used

Name: topic
Description: The category of the ResearchDefinition, such as Education, Treatment, Assessment, etc.DefinitionTopic (Example)

Name: author
Description: Who authored the content

Name: editor
Description: Who edited the content

Name: reviewer
Description: Who reviewed the content

Name: endorser
Description: Who endorsed the content

Name: relatedArtifact
Description: Additional documentation, citations, etc.

Name: library
Description: Logic used by the ResearchDefinition

Name: population
Description: What population?

Name: exposure
Description: What exposure?

Name: exposureAlternative
Description: What alternative exposure state?

Name: outcome
Description: What outcome?
